SummaryEnglish: Discover the legends of The Black Hope Horror, The Tower Of London, Harriet's Ghost and many more. Host Patrick Macnee (The Avengers) investigates real ghost stories guaranteed to stay with you through the darkest of nights and keep you on edge. Have you ever felt a strange presence around you, or heard a thump in the night...or gotten a chill for no reason at all? Macnee answers these questions and more as he investigates some of the world's most documented haunted destinations. Not only will Patrick and The Ghost Stories Experts rid an actual house of an actual poltergeist, they'll even teach you how to find and get rid of unfriendly spirits. This program will make you think twice next time you hear that strange noise in the middle of the night or feel like somebody's watching you

1.SummaryEnglish: The London Underworld & Beyond includes a look at "The Screaming Tower", "Sweet Adelaida", "Real Life Poltergeist", "Lady in White", "You Can't Take it With You" and "Railroad Spirits".

2.SummaryEnglish: The Poltergeists includes a look at "Alamo Spirits", "Spirits in Our Midst", "Ghosts Behind Bars", "Harriet's Ghost", "Banning Ghost" and "Hotel Hell".

3.SummaryEnglish: Spirits, Graveyards & Ghostbusters includes a look at "Red Feather", "Legend of Moody's Light", "Spirit Investigators", "From the Other Side", "Shadows of Chicago", "Spirits Among Us" and "Star Struck Spirits".

4.SummaryEnglish: Hollywood Ghosts includes a look at "Hollywood Ghosts", "Hollywood Sign Suicide", "Elizabeth Short", "Joan Crawford's House", "Marilyn Monroe" and "Afterlife",

5.TitleEnglish: The Wild West of the Dead
5.SummaryEnglish: The Wild West of the Dead includes a look at "Old West", "Big Nose Kate's", "Tombstone Spirits", "Emily Morton", "Historical Quirks" and "Calico".

6.SummaryEnglish: The Dead & The Restless includes a look at "Wandering Spirits", "Legends", "Tofu Seller's Wives", "Native American Spirits", "Nigerian Ghosts", "The Dybbuk" and "Origins of Ghost Stories".
